title: Alien Resurrection
review: A decent idea that failed heavily in execution. The second half is made entirely of loosely roped together set pieces and the monster design at the end is terrible. It's particularly disappointing to watch as it falls apart and loses your attention. Deserving of its reputation as the worst of the non-Predator Alien movies; if I saw this when I was 12 I would have loved it, but I would have been wrong to do so.
